memberdef.name: aos_post_event

detaileddescription.para: Register a poll event in main loop.

Post a delayed action to be executed in main loop.

detaileddescription.para: Cancel a delayed action to be executed in main loop.

parameterdescription.para: milliseconds to wait, -1 means don't care.

detaileddescription.para: Schedule a callback in next event loop. Unlike aos_post_delayed_action, this function can be called from non-aos-main-loop context.

simplesect.para: the operation status, <0 is error,others is OK.
the handler of aos_loop_t,NULL failure,others success.

detaileddescription.para: Exit event loop, aos_loop_run() will return.
Schedule a callback specified event loop.

parameterdescription.para: event loop to be scheduled, NULL for default main loop.

detaileddescription.para: Schedule a work to be executed in workqueue.

parameterdescription.para: milliseconds to delay before execution, 0 means immediately.
